title: Team Assignment
statement:
# Team Assignment

Farmer John is organizing a programming competition for his cows.

## Problem Description

There are N cows participating, and each cow has a skill level. FJ wants to divide the cows into teams of exactly 3 cows each.

For a team to be balanced, the difference between the maximum and minimum skill levels on the team must be at most K.

Determine the maximum number of balanced teams that can be formed.

## Input Format

The first line contains N and K.
The second line contains N space-separated integers representing skill levels.

## Output Format

A single integer representing the maximum number of balanced teams.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 1000
- 0 ≤ K ≤ 10^9
- 0 ≤ skill level ≤ 10^9
